text: CLOSE Julia Louis - Dreyfus was awarded the Mark Twain Prize for humor at the annual ceremony at the Kennedy Center in Washington, D. C. USA TODAY Julia Louis - Dreyfus poses on the red carpet before receiving the Mark Twain Prize for American Humor on Oct. 21, 2018. ( Photo : ANDREW CABALLERO - REYNOLDS, AFP / Getty Images ) WASHINGTON â€“ Julia Louis - Dreyfus walked away with the Mark Twain Prize and a pretty good roasting by her fellow celebrities at the Kennedy Center Sunday.
